query:
UPDATE jade_disk
            SET bad = ?,
                capacity = ?,
                closed = ?,
                copy_id = ?,
                date_created = ?,
                date_updated = ?,
                device_path = ?,
                label = ?,
                on_hold = ?,
                uuid = ?,
                version = ?,
                jade_host_id = ?,
                disk_archive_uuid = ?,
                hardware_metadata = ?
            WHERE jade_disk_id = ?
